# VEHICLE::NETWORK_CAP_EMPTY_CROWDING_VEHICLES_REMOVAL

## Summary
Sets the total number of vehicles at which the aggressive removal will kick in

## Parameters
* **INT** capNum: The number of vehicles, beyond which will trigger agressive removal (if it is enabled for this frame)

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Default:1000||This sets a value which is used when NETWORK_ENABLE_EMPTY_CROWDING_VEHICLES_REMOVAL(true) is called each frame.
